name: TimeRush!
description:
'TimeRush!' is a time-related minigames video game. The game is composed of four game modes: chronometer, timer, sonorous reaction time, and visual reaction time.

Use the mouse to play the game.

The game is available in four languages: Euskara, English, French, and Spanish.

'TimeRush!' was firstly released for Android devices. The Android version includes two local multiplayer game modes (for two people).

If you find any errors, do not hesitate to write a comment explaining what happened.
